title: Error Updating Patch
body:
Standard LoL update, but this time 'crash' popped-up.. Screenshots there.. 

Any solutions? 

Thanks..

replies.body:
It's strange to see a bugsplat happening during an update, as these errors usually occur when rendering fails.  Even though it happened while patching, it may have been caused by something else because the updated client is still running while prepping for updates.  

To start off, I suggest grabbing our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and using it to auto-configure your firewall settings to make sure that your connection is allowing access to the patching servers.  Should the issue persists, hop on the legacy client and let me know if you run into any other specific error messages.

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know what you find out.

Hello! Thanks for your reply..

I got this error for program "Hextech Repair Tool" when I try to open it.

It's says : "CreateProcess failed with error  193: %1 is not vaild win 32 application"

And I don't have Beta Cilent..

That's a peculiar error.  What happens if you try reinstalling the HRT, and making sure to have it save to a directory that you have permissions/access to?  Unless you are an admin, your pc settings could be preventing the HRT and even game files from being read.  Go ahad and reinstall the HRT, but go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide as well just in case something with your PC or some other software is causing these blocks.  Let me know.

Sorry for late reply.. On page, It was showing and still sometimes, that I am lvl 7 and my themes are not here anymore.. 
Anyways, it's all fixed.. I run HRT on Windows 10 (have two window's installed) and repair-ed game.. And now it's all ok..


Thanks for your answers mate!

All the best!

Greetings!
